component.name: GTKetchup
component.summary: A modern, circular Pomodoro Timer for GNOME

description.p: Stay focused and increase your productivity with GTKetchup, a native GNOME application built with GTK4 and Libadwaita. It features a beautiful, custom-drawn circular interface that dynamically changes colors the longer you focus.

ul.li: Intuitive circular timer with luminous dots
Scroll support for quick time adjustments (minutes and seconds)
Continuous color transitioning for extended focus sessions
System notifications and sounds when time is up

screenshot.caption: The circular Pomodoro Timer interface in action

ul.li: Scroll to increase minutes, Shift+Scroll for seconds
